MainMission.Tutorial_CreateIdentityCard_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="unknown"/][UE:Meta key="97b4baf3ab9442418817e8562cdead1a" Scale="1"/]Following emergency protocol, all officers
were directed to evacuate the spaceship
immediately. [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Finding [System:Color name="Default"]the dispersed [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Rescue
Corps[System:Color name="Default"] is now your top priority!
MainMission.Tutorial_JoinHappy_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="unknown"/][UE:Meta key="dc3e830cef31410982c30c9b9c175785" Scale="1"/]You encountered the Rescue Corps's Rescue
Pup, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! The remaining six Rescue Officers
are still out there somewhere...
MainMission.Tutorial_JoinGuide_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="unknown"/][UE:Meta key="dbb9c233087d435a8f9aa71320480007" Scale="1"/]You met up with [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], the Rescue Corps's
comms operator! That's one down! Now,
where could the other Rescue Officers be?
MainMission.Tutorial_SearchSpaceShip_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="16622b810cb545b48b6ed1fb3d7fa057" Scale="1"/]Head for the S.S. Shepherd
MainMission.Tutorial_SearchSpaceShip_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="78faf9674d7d49979d8bd41d66215354" Scale="1"/]The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]S.S. Shepherd[System:Color name="Default"] made its emergency landing
nearby. Head to the ship first to start looking
for the other five Rescue Officers.
MainMission.Tutorial_Announce_PromptExit_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0c4b1979e60642dd8b21a1c335f713c2" Scale="1"/]We found Captain [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal02"/]Shepherd[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! With the captain
here, it feels like there may be some hope for
us after all!
MainMission.Tutorial_RescuePreparation_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="cdc2ab044f9142d6bc5240d87161574e" Scale="1"/]It doesn't seem like the other Rescue Officers
are close by. If we got the S.S. Shepherd's
radar working, you could search for them.
MainMission.Tutorial_Demo_SearchTreasure_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="f183f7350229480cbcd196053ddcb7f6" Scale="1"/]Apparently [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]sparkly objects[System:Color name="Default"] can be used as an
energy source. Locate as many as you can so
you can restart the S.S. Shepherd!
MainMission.Main_02_Kira_Child_00_Telop: [UE:Meta key="f56eb5780907456fa62a7c1a644e0ed5" Scale="1"/]The S.S. Shepherd Is Running!
MainMission.Main_02_Kira_Child_00_Stack_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="a0bb7c59510943b38006eb3ca22c0c23" Scale="1"/]We restarted the S.S. Shepherd using the
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]sparklium [System:Color name="Default"]extracted from the treasure!
MainMission.Tutorial_Announce_DoFastTravel_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="724a41f739e24019b3cb7faf66eea8c1" Scale="1"/]The SOS signals we discovered must be coming
from our Rescue Officers. Come talk to me as
soon as you're ready.
MainMission.Main_01_Join_Child_01_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="cbdf3ae6d6334929aaf104e905f3e0cf" Scale="1"/]Search for Lost Rescue Officers
MainMission.Main_01_Join_Child_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ac2b9341646f48c6adfa652a560eac5c" Scale="1"/]Our [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]missing Rescue Officers[System:Color name="Default"] should be in the
area. Search every inch of this place until you
find them.
MainMission.Main_01_Join_Child_02_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="57585a1dc7e84b5faeff4eeed3a2dc76" Scale="1"/]You found [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], the Rescue Corps's talented
scientist! Keep searching for the rest of the
Rescue Officers.
MainMission.Main_01_Join_Child_03_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ed1990e903134c13a83c7ad996925b09" Scale="1"/]Who would have thought there would be [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]others
here[System:Color name="Default"] besides [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and the Rescue
Corps? If we find more, we should save them.
MainMission.Main_01_Join_Child_04_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ad484bf7e3a8427180f88416b247bd38" Scale="1"/]You found another [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]unexpected castaway[System:Color name="Default"]!
Why did they think it was wise to come to an
unknown planet? Ah well, keep on looking.
MainMission.Main_01_Join_Child_04a_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="7db4a45e7bcb451b9956f44d0e928517" Scale="1"/]You tracked down our ranger, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal06"/]Dingo[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! The only
Rescue Officers still out there now are the
doctor and the pilot.
MainMission.Main_01_Join_Child_04b_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="fb61613060684cd195abc9b63812e679" Scale="1"/]Another [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]unknown castaway[System:Color name="Default"] discovered! Why
did so many come to this planet? Better keep
searching.
MainMission.Main_01_Join_Child_04c_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f0ee561afae44c27afa30be77b721c96" Scale="1"/]Yet [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]another civilian castaway[System:Color name="Default"]. Seems like a lot
of curious individuals don't know what's best
for them. Go on out and continue searching.
MainMission.Main_01_Join_Child_05_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="4f0ac7ffbc9a40f2b160f86558f98ed4" Scale="1"/]You found a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]strange castaway[System:Color name="Default"] again! What do
you think drew this one here? Well, don't stop
searching now.
MainMission.Main_01_Join_Child_06_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="879cb0680e7e4fc28f352ba100e99fbf" Scale="1"/]You rescued our doctor, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! There's only
one Rescue Officer left now. Go find our pilot!
MainMission.Main_03_Pilot_Child_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="8c4adee2aa024100af5e9e6456b613db" Scale="1"/]You rescued our doctor, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! That leaves
our pilot, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], who [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]might be a leafling[System:Color name="Default"].
Prioritize finding and securing the leaflings!
MainMission.Main_03_Pilot_Stack_Child_02_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="7b79f9a63f884f6c89139c24cdf6873c" Scale="1"/]Ask the Doctor about Cure
MainMission.Main_03_Pilot_Stack_Child_02a_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="8df86301fc9f4b3688a5e801df034f83" Scale="1"/]You rescued our doctor, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! Let's ask him
to examine a leafling when he wakes up. Our
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]pilot[System:Color name="Default"], [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]might be one[System:Color name="Default"] after all.
MainMission.Main_03_Pilot_Stack_Child_02_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="94eb9c5793774216861f213e3eedc813" Scale="1"/]The leafling you rescued [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]could be our pilot[System:Color name="Default"].
Let's ask [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to examine them to see if they
can be returned to their original form.
MainMission.Main_03_Pilot_Child_03_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="95968cbff0db42d6b53b02c8571c464d" Scale="1"/]Go collect the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]medicinal ingredient[System:Color name="Default"] I need to
cure the leafling. You'll need to harvest it from
a Lumiknoll, which only appears at night.
MainMission.Main_03_Pilot_Child_04_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="e1b793d43d454dea96766b4cf98800e8" Scale="1"/]If you find other leaflings, [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]bring them here[System:Color name="Default"] so
we can cure them too! We'll find our pilot next.
I'm sure of it!
MainMission.Main_03_Pilot_Child_05_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="693a063d6a5643df80ee809f440ee556" Scale="1"/]Oh scrubs! [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]We're all out of glow sap.[System:Color name="Default"] Time for
more exciting night expeditions, eheheh.
MainMission.Main_03_Pilot_Child_06_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="507fbfcae9f24e9bbcab4cdaad4034a8" Scale="1"/]Find the Leafling with the Dog
MainMission.Main_03_Pilot_Child_06_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="63b7ae862f7e4156a75417214c1b1d51" Scale="1"/]So many leaflings! We bring 'em in one after
another, and still no [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]! Let's get after
that [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]leafling with the dog[System:Color name="Default"] and get him to tell
us where our pilot is!
MainMission.Main_03_Pilot_Child_06a_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="a96fb6090f824d0cbd28f3ba7992b229" Scale="1"/]Tracking down Lumiknolls at night can be a
little risky. Find and [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]activate lots of bases
[System:Color name="Default"]during the day so we can use them at night.
MainMission.Main_03_Pilot_Child_18_Telop: [UE:Meta key="b2cd97b626eb4103993392183d3dd131" Scale="1"/]Found All Lost Rescue Officers!
MainMission.Main_01_Join_Parent_End:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="b0e5a9a9283844498919b4a23f57ecb8" Scale="1"/]We found and cured the pilot [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Pilot"/]Bernard[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
The Rescue Corps has been reunited!
MainMission.Main_02_Kira_Child_00_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="635deb2df78d498fba6e63115a0dcd25" Scale="1"/]If we're going to restore the S.S. Shepherd's
radar and expand our search area, we need
you to go out and [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]gather more sparklium[System:Color name="Default"]!
MainMission.Main_02_Kira_Parent_End:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="446547f465b9422d86a1b2e6230a1352" Scale="1"/]We've stored up plenty of energy for the
S.S. Shepherd and expanded the radar
search area. The [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]engines are ready to
go [System:Color name="Default"]again too!
MainMission.Main_05_Olimar_Child_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="f66f18a8761a46a79c6ddc76594e5ef1" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is shipwrecked on this unknown
planet. Discover his whereabouts while you
search for missing Rescue Corps Officers.
MainMission.Main_05_Olimar_Child_02_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="fd092e731dd24b01a59bad9840f6530a" Scale="1"/]There's been [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]no sign of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] in any
of the places we've explored so far[System:Color name="Default"]. If we
gather more energy to expand our radar's
range, I'm sure we'll find a clue.
MainMission.Main_05_Olimar_Child_03_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="e5cb9307c2ca4fdfac97218ed2416ffe" Scale="1"/]Return to Rescue Command Post
MainMission.Main_05_Olimar_Child_03_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="6d0dca0ca00844b49236e92480ce3fed" Scale="1"/]With this much energy, we can increase our
radar's output to its maximum. Stop by the
Rescue Command Post!
MainMission.Main_05_Olimar_Child_04_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="23f6d419746e40a69d79db12387d94a4" Scale="1"/]It appears that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] visited a place
called [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Hero's Hideaway[System:Color name="Default"] right before he went
missing. Search carefully for the SOS signal
inside the building.
MainMission.Main_Area010Card_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="3e69050202a147628d7aa0f909c32833" Scale="1"/]Find the Code to the Bunker
MainMission.Main_Area010Card_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0df46447414445a49a37d4296599d654" Scale="1"/]You discovered a locked [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]bunker[System:Color name="Default"]! There must
be a clue somewhere telling us where to find
the code that opens it.
MainMission.Main_Area010Card_OpenShellter_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="05b9b288aa504abca920b280bc2603aa" Scale="1"/]Hmm... Those cards you collected have
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]mysterious symbols [System:Color name="Default"]on them! I feel like I've
seen symbols somewhere else recently...
MainMission.Main_05_Olimar_Child_04_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="281a2ed0991343efb057bef9b746bc1a" Scale="1"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]That leafling[System:Color name="Default"] was inside the bunker! Could
it be [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] after all?
MainMission.Main_05_Olimar_Child_05_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="9a79450c1b1f49788cc89c0dd55d7b48" Scale="1"/]The leafling is still unconscious. Hurry and
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]bring them safely back[System:Color name="Default"] to the S.S. Beagle so
we can find out if it's truly [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
MainMission.Main_05_Olimar_Child_06_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="bc520ed3807c4a3481f3c6cf0bef17ab" Scale="1"/]We [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]need more medicine[System:Color name="Default"] to cure the leafling
claiming to be [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. Head out for
a night expedition, and harvest some glow sap.
MainMission.Main_05_Olimar_Child_07_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="193d252d75474fd99eb5025346ff1c4f" Scale="1"/]Fantastic work, everyone! [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]We can use the cure[System:Color name="Default"]
to see if this is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. Let [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal10"/]Yonny[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] take
it from here. You've earned some rest!
MainMission.Main_05_Olimar_Parent_End:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e73c2b1d10e14a4697805fa137791269" Scale="1"/]That was quite the adventure, but we finally
rescued [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Mission accomplished![System:Color name="Default"]
MainMission.Main_07_Survivor_Child_00_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a020da95bf4a4f75ae7e5bca83c20af3" Scale="1"/]As if we didn't have enough work finding
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and the Rescue Corps, there
are also [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]civilian castaways[System:Color name="Default"] on this planet.
Rescue any that you come across.
MainMission.Main_07_Survivor_Child_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="fdb5b8c7409745e9aa8892bba510ec1b" Scale="1"/]According to the rescue-request list from HQ,
there are [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]43 civilian castaways[System:Color name="Default"] besides [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
The Rescue Corps's reputation is on the line!
Let's get out there and save every last one.
MainMission.Main_07_Survivor_Child_02_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="ec9c613667534a98bb7439cf71e77e52" Scale="1"/]Now that you've rescued all the castaways,
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]cure [System:Color name="Default"]those who have been turned into
leaflings. We're counting on you and
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
MainMission.Main_07_Survivor_Parent_End:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="f7413c7a1b5b448794fb684738781b23" Scale="1"/]You did it! [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]All castaways[System:Color name="Default"] have been rescued!
You two have proven to be talented Rescue
Officers and an exemplary team. Well done,
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="fb3c63aeca95429f9642f77c4aba59d8" Scale="1"/]It's clear the Koppaite veterinarian [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]not
in any of the areas we've investigated[System:Color name="Default"]. Collect
more energy to expand the search area!
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_02A_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="edea1fe67a534038ad04aa683d2c7a0b" Scale="1"/]This "[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]" is a renowned veterinarian. She
should have some ideas for what to do about
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s tail. Focus search efforts in the
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]newly discovered area[System:Color name="Default"].
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_02_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="358316313fd743378d0c05948d805b19" Scale="1"/]This "[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]" is a renowned veterinarian. She
should have some ideas for what to do about
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s tail. Focus the search efforts in the
newly discovered [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Giant's Hearth[System:Color name="Default"].
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_03_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="dee817b9e4b04331b3c1b60aee727676" Scale="1"/]You found a Koppaite! It isn't [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], but I hope
he can at least help us find her. Let's see
what we can learn after he wakes up.
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_03_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="3ee3352a8e914dc58d9e5c8d79aa2f70" Scale="1"/]Return to Rescue Command Post
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_04A_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="35fd88e2e6b2446db55f75b3246db97a" Scale="1"/]According to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s companion [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Charlie"/]Don Bergman[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],
she may be in [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Giant's Hearth[System:Color name="Default"]. Get back out
there and find her. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s counting on you!
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_04B_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="a172083ca09a4f7f9015c6c634ea800b" Scale="1"/]According to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s companion [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], she may
be near [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Giant's Hearth[System:Color name="Default"]. Get back out there and
find her. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s counting on you!
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_05A_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ed519b73b6eb4f629aadbe58d9577d9a" Scale="1"/]You rescued [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s companion [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Alph"/]Yorke[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. He may
know where she is. As soon as he wakes up,
we'll find out what he has to say!
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_05A_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="76e145463cc34cedba0808b2e3b57fad" Scale="1"/]Return to Rescue Command Post
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_05B_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="0f7620323436424db8977288b97450c7" Scale="1"/]You rescued [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s companion [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Charlie"/]Don Bergman[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
He may know where she is. As soon as he
wakes up, we'll find out what he has to say.
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_05B_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="da906aeb8d8440c2b58f932365868819" Scale="1"/]Return to Rescue Command Post
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_06_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="3fbd1d94bc0e4e29aefec13510224931" Scale="1"/]If we're going to pick up an SOS signal from
the forest [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] might be in, we need to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]get
enough energy[System:Color name="Default"] to increase our radar's range.
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_07A_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="c5fca38485a0445a99646dc89e306a37" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was apparently carried off by a huge
dog. She should be in the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]newly discovered
area[System:Color name="Default"]. Let's rescue her and save [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_07_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="4e6fd90238cf4da0a120e75453e5d3cc" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was apparently carried off by a giant
dog. She should be here in the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Primordial
Thicket[System:Color name="Default"]. Let's rescue her and save [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_07_Purpose: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][UE:Meta key="a92ba8901e7a4ead81eaa3f3a327cd69" Scale="1"/]Search for [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] the Veterinarian
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_08_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5e086ce8bb5844ae873e29c2907d4a9b" Scale="1"/]We did it! We finally rescued [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Brittany"/]Nelle[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. If anybody
knows what to do about [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s tail, she'll be
the one. Once she wakes up, we'll find out!
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_08_Purpose: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][UE:Meta key="174d07452939475b8340b1b9f0ce4432" Scale="1"/]Return to Rescue Command Post
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_08_Telop: [UE:Meta key="fb3f81fb43f54c80aa83256631c87a21" Scale="1"/]Got a Lead for Curing [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]!
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_09_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="589e5b3656834c72bc0780ed796675b4" Scale="1"/]To cure [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s tail, we'll need [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]cells from a dog
without a leaf on its tail[System:Color name="Default"]. You need to get close
to that giant dog that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is with, eheheh.
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_09_Purpose: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][UE:Meta key="62269d297358469b9c7136a266519bc3" Scale="1"/]Find [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and the Giant Dog
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_10_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f6612db01d3d42d19e09aed460e83e43" Scale="1"/]The Voyage Log entry found at the entrance to
the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Cavern for a King[System:Color name="Default"] suggests [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and the
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]giant dog[System:Color name="Default"] are somewhere in the depths of this
cave. Let's find them and make [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s cure!
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_10_Purpose: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][UE:Meta key="ee423594ed9c4115bbc596a518fc3c8b" Scale="1"/]Pursue [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and the Giant Dog
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_11_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5b10f57901ca4668b76a75de11a5d43f" Scale="1"/]A [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]massive dog[System:Color name="Default"] running rampant in the depths...
It's a dangerous situation, but we have to stop
him. I know you have what it takes to do this,
[Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_11_Purpose: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][UE:Meta key="7c4c7594476a49e3838cd08ded7a3fb7" Scale="1"/]Stop the Giant Dog's Rampage
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Child_12_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="090fa4adec7f4886992593ed1937184e" Scale="1"/]The giant dog's collar has some fur on it.
This should be enough to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]make a cure[System:Color name="Default"] for
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. Maaaybe I'll create some completely
new medicine while I'm at it, eheheh.
MainMission.Main_06_Happy_Parent_End:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="5ebf4534f1e7470ebea6b79cc52d9ee7" Scale="1"/]With everyone's help, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]tail has
been cured[System:Color name="Default"]. Now we can all get off this
planet together. Thank goodness!
MainMission.Story_Complete_ExploreRate_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="4b7d1c17d1a24eac8518b89505d50d89" Scale="1"/]There are [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]many things on the planet you have
yet to discover[System:Color name="Default"]. We've come this far—let's
investigate everything!
MainMission.Story_Complete_ExploreRate_End:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="938f65ae887645bf87c9f41baecbbff5" Scale="1"/]After a phenomenal effort, your investigation
of the planet is [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]complete[System:Color name="Default"]! You'll go down in
Rescue Corps history as the best Rescue
Officer ever, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
MainMission.Main_03_Pilot_Child_05a_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="8649e8e721b247bd9e9187befe3bfb56" Scale="1"/]Return to Rescue Command Post
MainMission.Main_03_Pilot_Child_05a_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="9cf6a40f4dfa4611a8a68d684f9a8ad8" Scale="1"/]We have medicine in stock that can be used
to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]cure [System:Color name="Default"]the rescued leaflings. Come back to the
Rescue Command Post so we can commence
the procedure, eheheh...
MainMission.Main_03_Pilot_Child_04a_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="143bbf036a2343899a44267ae13a43b5" Scale="0.9940358"/]Find Base in Sun-Speckled Terrace
MainMission.Main_03_Pilot_Child_04a_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="022e6a2f20b049c39dee000e812d7525" Scale="1"/]Ready for another night expedition, eh? Then
you'll need to find more bases where you can
safely land during the day. I suggest you scope
out that big clearing in [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Sun-Speckled Terrace[System:Color name="Default"].
MainMission.Main_07_Survivor_Child_01a_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="73630fa881f94701a81a8476afe2f14d" Scale="1"/]We rescued a castaway, but with all the leaves
growing out of their head, there's no way to
tell who it is. We must find a way to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]cure [System:Color name="Default"]them
of this condition as soon as possible.
MainMission.Main_07_Survivor_Child_01b_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="1d6d0b95af0748f09d517596a5022f7e" Scale="1"/]There are castaways and leaflings on this
planet beyond [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and the Rescue
Corps. No matter who they are, it's our job to
find them, [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]rescue them, and cure them[System:Color name="Default"].
